blogPost.excerpt: Version data, track models, train on custom clusters - without worrying about setting up infrastructure or cloud compute. Save on cloud costs by only paying for what you need. Run hyperparameter sweeps on multiple nodes with the click of a button.
blogPost.body: Version data, track models, train on custom clusters - without worrying about setting up infrastructure or cloud compute. Save on cloud costs by only paying for what you need. Run hyperparameter sweeps on multiple nodes with the click of a button.
blogPost.title: latch.ai - Train, track and serve machine learning on the cloud.
blogPost.author: Kenny Workman

localize.description: 版本数据、跟踪模型、在自定义集群上进行训练--无需担心设置基础设施或云计算。只需为您需要的东西付费，即可节省云计算成本。只需点击一个按钮，即可在多个节点上运行超参数扫描。
localize.tagline: 在云上训练、跟踪和服务机器学习。

localize.description: 版本數據、跟蹤模型、在自定義集羣上進行訓練--無需擔心設置基礎設施或雲計算。只需爲您需要的東西付費，即可節省雲計算成本。只需點擊一個按鈕，即可在多個節點上運行超參數掃描。
localize.tagline: 在雲上訓練、跟蹤和服務機器學習。

previous.excerpt: Clipboard checker is an open source set it and forget it chrome extension that scans any text you copy in your browser to determine if malicious content has been added or changed.
previous.title: Clipboard Checker - Keep your clipboard safe from JS injections.

localize.description: 剪贴板检查器是一个开源的设置并忘记它的chrome扩展，它可以扫描你在浏览器中复制的任何文本，以确定是否有恶意内容被添加或更改。
localize.tagline: 保护你的剪贴板不被JS注入。

localize.description: 剪貼板檢查器是一個開源的設置並忘記它的chrome擴展，它可以掃描你在瀏覽器中複製的任何文本，以確定是否有惡意內容被添加或更改。
localize.tagline: 保護你的剪貼板不被JS注入。

localize.full_text: 马特-拉福尔自3月以来一直坐拥现金。
馬特-拉福爾自3月以來一直坐擁現金。
